message.content:
1. It is proposed that certain effects may be more involved in early phases of drug addiction.
2. Negative reinforcement effects may occur more in later stages of drug addiction.
3. The illness referred to in the statement is drug addiction.

messages.content:
Statement: It is proposed that these effects may be more involved in early phases of drug addiction, whereas negative reinforcement effects may occur more in later stages of the illness.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
